1.title: Face Up with Jennifer Tilly
1.plot: We showcase cash game action from Rivers Casino in Pittsburgh, PA. Plus, we do our first in-depth interview with Jennifer Tilly. Featuring Jennifer Tilly, Matt Glantz, Bobby Noel, Jack Schanbacher, Shaun Deeb, Maria Ho, Jason Andrews, Griffin Abel, and Dave Eldridge.

2.title: Any Two Cards
2.plot: Rivers Casino in Pittsburgh, PA hosts our cash game while our invited pros start to play a little loose. Also, we show Part 2 of our in-depth interview with Jennifer Tilly. Featuring Matt Brady, Alec Torelli, Jennifer Tilly, Jack Schanbacher, Shaun Deeb, Daniel Wolf, Dave Eldridge, Matt Glantz, Bobby Noel, and Jason Andrews.

3.title: The Rivers of Pittsburgh
3.plot: Our pros go all the way to the river in our exclusive cash game from Rivers Casino in Pittsburgh, PA. Featuring Patsy Altomari, Alec Torelli, Keith Morrow, Jennifer Tilly, Daniel Wolf, Matt Glantz, and Griffin Abel.

4.title: The Wizard
4.plot: Misty morning, clouds in the sky, without warning, the wizard walks by our cash game at Rivers Casino in Pittsburgh, PA. Featuring Claude Petroy, Alec Torelli, Keith Morrow, Jennifer Tilly, Daniel Wolf, Stepan Gusak, Griffin Abel, Patsy Altomari, and Matt Glantz.

5.title: Where There's Smoke...
5.plot: We visit the poker room at SugarHouse Casino in Philadelphia, PA, and rub elbows with some of the East Coast's most notable players. Featuring Greg Fishberg, Todd Brunson, Matt Glantz, Linda Kenney Baden, Mark Herm, Joe McKeehen, and Gajan Jeganathan.

6.title: Face Up with Shaun Deeb
6.plot: We continue the poker party at SugarHouse Casino, with east coast grinders battling hand for hand in Philadelphia. Plus, we showcase the first part of our in-depth interview with the always-controversial Shaun Deeb. Featuring Todd Brunson, Linda Kenney Baden, Joe Mckeehen, Matt Glantz, Greg Fishberg, Yitong Wang, and Shaun Deeb.

7.title: Pay the Troll Toll
7.plot: Our second day of filming at SugarHouse Casino in Philadelphia, PA begins with some big hands and small needles. Featuring Matt Glantz, Todd Brunson, Jo Kim, Mike Sigel, Greg Himmelbrand, Shaun Deeb, Tony Reed, and Thai Ha.

8.title: Sugar and Spice
8.plot: The poker spices up as the night winds down at SugarHouse Casino in Philadelphia, PA. Featuring Kyle Bowker, Todd Brunson, Akim Akimov, Mike Sigel, Matt Brady, Shaun Deeb, and Thai Ha.

9.title: Face Up with E-Tay
9.plot: We return to Hollywood, Florida to visit the Seminole Hard Rock Hotel and Casino, plus we showcase the first segment of our in-depth interview with Esther Taylor. Featuring Cate Hall, Jason Mercier, Jennifer Tilly, Stewart Newman, Wendeen Eolis, Esther Taylor, and Tim Reilly.

10.title: Charitable Donations
10.plot: Basically, Jason Mercier is somehow telepathic or something because he CRUSHES this entire table. Featuring Cate Hall, Jason Mercier, Jennifer Tilly, Stewart Newman, Wendeen Eolis, Esther Taylor, and Tim Reilly.

11.title: Cranberries
11.plot: We begin our second day of filming cash game action at Seminole Hard Rock Hotel and Casino in Hollywood, FL. Featuring Tom Marchese, Jessica Dawley, Matt Berkey, Jennifer Tilly, Dan O'Brien, Aaron Mermelstein, and Dan Suied.

12.title: Woe is Stapes
12.plot: Our exclusive cash game continues from Seminole Hard Rock in Hollywood, FL, with some tough cards hitting the community, but it seems to hit Joe Stapleton hardest of all. Featuring Tom Marchese, Jessica Dawley, Matt Berkey, Jennifer Tilly, Dan O'Brien, Aaron Mermelstein, and Dan Suied.

13.title: The Man with the Biggest Stack
13.plot: Brad Garrett joins our table at Seminole Hard Rock in Hollywood, FL. Can he hold his own against the pros? He's certainly got a big enough chip stack. Featuring Brad Garrett, Jennifer Tilly, Jason Mercier, Kyle Bowker, Brandon Adams, Ryan Fee, and Eric Wasserson.

14.title: You are a Mother #%$@&r!
14.plot: Jennifer Tilly goes full Jennifer TILTy as we conclude our filming at Seminole Hard Rock in Hollywood, FL. Featuring Eric Wasserson, Esther Taylor, Ryan Fee, Jennifer Tilly, Jason Mercier, Kyle Bowker, and Michael Laake.

15.title: Winterhalter is Coming
15.plot: We corral seven of California's poker elite at our cash game table hosted by Thunder Valley Casino Resort in Lincoln, CA. Featuring Lee Markholt, Kelly Winterhalter, David Sands, Phil Hellmuth, Harlan Karnofsky, Rep Porter, Keith McNair, and Bob Mather.

16.title: Quick Sands
16.plot: Our cash game continues from the beautiful Thunder Valley Casino Resort in Lincoln, CA. Featuring Lee Markholt, Kelly Winterhalter, David Sands, Phil Hellmuth, Jerry Utke, Matt Glantz, Rep Porter, Keith McNair, and Bob Mather.

17.title: Top Golf
17.plot: We begin our second day of filming cash game action at Thunder Valley Casino Resort in Lincoln, CA, plus our players take a visit to a Top Golf facility to show off their driving chops. Featuring Matt Glantz, Tom Schneider, Kelly Winterhalter, Brad Garrett, Tony Bracy, Phil Hellmuth, and Harlan Karnofsky.

18.title: Way Down in the Valley
18.plot: We conclude our epic cash game from Thunder Valley Casino in Lincoln, CA. Featuring Brad Garrett, Phil Hellmuth, Lee Markholt, Tom Schneider, Kelly Winterhalter, Tony Bracy, Rep Porter, and Jed Hoffman.

19.title: P.O.W.
19.plot: Phil Laak invents new poker terms during our first visit to Golden Nugget Casino in Las Vegas, Nevada. Featuring Joe Cada, Maria Ho, Greg Mueller, Greg Merson, Phil Hellmuth, Bill Lee, Liv Boeree, and Phil Laak.

20.title: Heckmuth
20.plot: We get some epic Hellmuth rants in this one from Golden Nugget Casino in Las Vegas, Nevada. Featuring Joe Cada, Maria Ho, Greg Mueller, Phil Hellmuth, Brandon Cantu, Bill Lee, Liv Boeree, and Phil Laak.

21.title: Pass the Eight Ball
21.plot: The outlook is good for our players as we begin our second day of filming at The Golden Nugget Casino in Las Vegas Nevada. Featuring Jim Carroll, Craig Casino, Stan Jablonksi, Jared Jaffee, Mario Orozco, Richard Roeper, and Brandon Cantu.

22.title: Not Live from Las Vegas
22.plot: We close out the second day of our series from The Golden Nugget Casino in Las Vegas, Nevada with the best hands from the night. Featuring Jim Carroll, Craig Casino, Stan Jablonksi, Jared Jaffee, Mario Orozco, Richard Roeper, Matt Glantz, Mike Dentale, and Brandon Cantu.

23.title: Maybe I Just Hit Quads
23.plot: We shake up the cast at our table as we begin our third day of filming from The Golden Nugget in Las Vegas, Nevada. Featuring Alan Richardson, Ryan Fee, Kyle Bowker, Jennifer Tilly, Cindy Kerslake, Bryn Kenney, and Esther Taylor.

24.title: Panning for Gold
24.plot: Our players try and sift for those last few nuggets as the night winds down on our visit to The Golden Nugget Casino in Las Vegas, Nevada. Featuring Alan Richardson, Ryan Fee, Kyle Bowker, Jennifer Tilly, Cindy Kerslake, Bryn Kenney, and Esther Taylor.

25.title: Poker Night in Canada!
25.plot: We team up with our friends at partypoker to make our first trip to Canada. Playground Poker Club in Montreal is host to our high-stakes cash game, played by luminaries from the US, Canada, and the UK. Featuring Antonio Esfandiari, Sam Trickett, Francois Safieddine, Ouri Ohayon, Lauren Roberts, Rob Yong, and John Krpan.

26.title: A Playground for Poker
26.plot: The pros at partypoker sling chips at nose-bleed stakes with their friends at Playground Poker Club in Montreal. Featuring Antonio Esfandiari, Sam Trickett, Francois Safieddine, Ouri Ohayon, Lauren Roberts, Rob Yong, and John Krpan.

27.title: Mauvais Coup
27.plot: There are some wicked turn outs for the partypoker pros as the poker at Playground Poker Club in Montreal winds down on the first day of our visit. Featuring Antonio Esfandiari, Sam Trickett, Jeff Gross, Lauren Roberts, Rob Yong, and John Krpan.

28.title: partypoker Poker Party
28.plot: We begin our second day at Playground Poker Club in Montreal, Quebec, and the pros from partypoker face off against some of the best players in North America. Featuring Antonio Esfandiari, Sam Trickett, Jeff Gross, Lauren Roberts, Rob Yong, and John Krpan.

29.title: Montreal Nights
29.plot: Our second day of filming at Playground Poker Club draws to a close as the pros from partypoker try to draw to a straight. Featuring Antonio Esfandiari, Sam Trickett, Jeff Gross, Lauren Roberts, Rob Yong, and John Krpan.

30.title: Glantzing Blows
30.plot: Poker Night in America Ambassador Matt Glantz joins the partypoker table at Playground Poker Club in Montreal to see how he fares against poker luminaries from Canada and the UK. Featuring Matt Glantz, John Duthie, Mike Dentale, Rob Yong, Pascal Lefrancois, Samuel Chartier, and Elliot Smith.

31.title: Mount Royal Flush
31.plot: As our third day at Playground Poker Club in Montreal carries on, we showcase some hands we can't believe and some names we can't pronounce. Featuring Manig Loeser, John Duthie, Mike Dentale, Rob Yong, Pascal Lefrancois, Samuel Chartier, and Elliot Smith.

32.title: The City of Saints
32.plot: We conclude our final day of filming with the pros at partypoker at the Playground Poker Club in Montreal Featuring Manig Loeser, John Duthie, Jason Koon, Rob Yong, Pascal Lefrancois, Samuel Chartier, and Elliot Smith.

33.title: Hanson Family Values
33.plot: Our first day of high stakes cash kicks off at Choctaw Casino, where Kyle Bowker puts on a poker clinic and runs over this table full of sharks. Featuring Bart Hanson, Kane Kalas, Mike Ross, Kyle Bowker, David Baker, Douglas Lorgeree and Sean Mates.

34.title: The Butcher, the Baker, the Over Pair Maker
34.plot: Can anything stop Kyle Bowker? Apparently not the sharks at this high stakes cash game. It's the second half of day one at Choctaw Casino in Durant, Oklahoma. Featuring Bart Hanson, Kane Kalas, Mike Ross, Kyle Bowker, David Baker, Douglas Lorgeree, Bobby Greeson and Sean Mates.

35.title: The Canadian Sensation
35.plot: It's the return of everyone's favorite poker degen to the Poker Night table: the Canadian sensation, Gavin Smith. Witness his greatness for the start of day two at Choctaw Casino in Durant, Oklahoma. Featuring Alec Torelli, Esther Taylor, Matt Glantz, Gavin Smith, Chan Pelton, David Baker, and Maxx Coleman.

36.title: Outplayed Like a Mo-Fo
36.plot: If watching infamous poker player Mike Dentale experience excruciating pain is your jam, then this one is for you. It's part two of day two at Choctaw Casino in Durant, Oklahoma. Featuring Alec Torelli, Esther Taylor, Mike Dentale, Gavin Smith, Chan Pelton, David Baker, and Will Berry.

37.title: Carrot Top of Poker
37.plot: The Carrot Top of Poker, Jim Carroll, covers the table in comedic props, and Table Captain Gavin Smith is having none of it. This is Day 3 Part 1 at Choctaw Casino in Durant, Oklahoma. Featuring Jim Carroll, Alec Torelli, Abdyl Konjuhi, Gavin Smith, Matt Russell, Bart Hanson, and Tom Gray.

38.title: Good Hugger
38.plot: Alec Torelli shows us why he is one of the best players in the biz, and Gavin Smith gets a hug. It's the end of Day 3 here at Choctaw Casino in Durant, Oklahoma. Featuring Jim Carroll, Alec Torelli, Abdyl Konjuhi, Gavin Smith, Matt Russell, Kyle Bowker, and Denise Good.

39.title: Fold Like a Pro
39.plot: Kyle Bowker puts on a clinic on proper folds, and Nick Immekus takes on Brandon Cantu in a roller coaster of a hand. This is Day 1 of our cash game at Rivers Casino Pittsburgh. Featuring Shaun Deeb, Todd Brunson, Kyle Bowker, Eli Elezra, Brandon Cantu, Kane Kalas and Nick Immekus.

40.title: Fullest House
40.plot: Sometimes being on a boat is a bad thing. Just ask David Eldridge. Day 1 continues here at Rivers Casino in Pittsburgh. Featuring Shaun Deeb, Todd Brunson, Kyle Bowker, Sam Ganzfried, Kane Kalas and Nick Immekus.

41.title: Manifold Puma
41.plot: Jack Schanbacher goes to great lengths for a possible win with seven deuce, and Joe Stapleton reveals himself to be a cat fancier. This is Day 2 of Poker Night in America at Rivers Casino in Pittsburgh. Featuring Mark Puma, Jack Schanbacher, Kyle Bowker, Todd Brunson, Kane Kalas, Shaun Deeb and Austin Wentling.

42.title: Grandma's Game
42.plot: This episode features a very special appearance by Irene Schanbacher, Jack's grandmother. Day 2 continues here at Rivers Casino in Pittsburgh. Featuring Mark Puma, Jack Schanbacher, Kyle Bowker, Todd Brunson, Kane Kalas, Shaun Deeb, Austin Wentling and Irene Schanbacher.

43.title: Hi Rollerz!
43.plot: We trade in our typical $25/50 game for $100/200. It's our High Roller table for Day 1 here at Seminole Hard Rock Hotel and Casino in Hollywood, Florida. Featuring Matt Berkey, Chance Kornuth, Joey DiPascale, Jason Mercier, James Calderaro, Bill Perkins and Mustapha Kanit.

44.title: Ride the Rollercoaster
44.plot: Fortunes are won and lost in this high roller game. This is what poker is all about. Day 1 continues at Seminole Hard Rock Hotel and Casino in Hollywood, Florida. Featuring Matt Berkey, Chance Kornuth, Joey DiPascale, Jason Mercier, James Calderaro, Bill Perkins and Mustapha Kanit.

45.title: High Altitude Poker
45.plot: In this episode, more money crosses the table than most of us will ever see in our lifetime. Isn't that - awesome? Day 1 of our High Roller game concludes here at Seminole Hard Rock Hotel and Casino in Hollywood, Florida. Featuring Matt Berkey, Chance Kornuth, Joey DiPascale, Jason Mercier, James Calderaro, Bill Perkins and Mustapha Kanit.

46.title: Themyscira
46.plot: Ladies Night returns to Poker Night in America. Samantha Abernathy flexes her bluffing muscles and Jessica Dawley gets crazy lucky on the river. Day 2 begins at Seminole Hard Rock Hotel and Casino in Hollywood, Florida. Featuring Natasha Mercier, Cate Hall, Lexy Gavin, Samantha Abernathy, Jessica Dawley, Kelly Minkin and Jamie Kerstetter.

47.title: Guilty Sam
47.plot: Sam Abernathy feels so guilty about winning all the time, and who can blame her? Day 2 continues at Seminole Hard Rock Hotel and Casino in Hollywood, Florida. Featuring Natasha Mercier, Cate Hall, Lexy Gavin, Samantha Abernathy, Jessica Dawley, Kelly Minkin and Jamie Kerstetter.

48.title: Bluffmeister
48.plot: Cate Hall discovers that she and Mike Dentale finally have something in common. Day 2 concludes of our Ladies Night Cash Game at Seminole Hard Rock Hotel and Casino in Hollywood, Florida. Featuring Natasha Mercier, Cate Hall, Lexy Gavin, Samantha Abernathy, Jessica Dawley and Jamie Kerstetter.

1.title: Pilot
1.plot: Welcome to Poker Night in America. In the Pilot episode, we'll give you a taste of what's to come in the series. We'll show you the journey from Vegas to Verona, NY for the inaugural Celebrity Cash Game at Turning Stone Resort. Finally we get to the action at that cash game.

2.title: Poker Action
2.plot: We go straight to the poker action in episode 2 of the series to our $5,000 minimum buy-in celebrity cash game at Turning Stone Resort in Verona, NY. Matt Glantz and Gavin Smith get tangled up in a hand that left Gavin with a taste in his mouth more sour than his beloved greyhounds. The two of them get a chance to talk it out.

3.title: Kristy Arnett
3.plot: This episode features player and poker journalist, Kristy Arnett. See what kind of trouble she can get herself at and away from the Poker Night in America Table. An excursion to the golf course at Turning Stone Casino in Verona, NY.

4.title: The Blow Up
4.plot: Mike Matusow and Sean Deeb get caught up in an explosive situation. Is a slow rolled ever justified? Be sure to come back for the aftermath in the next episode.

5.title: Get a Grip
5.plot: The action around the Poker Night in America table takes an awkward turn in the wake of the slow roll. The pros take a break for a golf scramble.

6.title: Nolan
6.plot: In addition to the always awesome and often alliterated premium poker, we introduce you to our creative director Nolan Dalla. Nolan is a well respected member of the poker community and a genuine character.

7.title: Meta Show
7.plot: This week on Poker Night, the cash game at Turning Stone Casino continues and we take a peek under the hood of Poker Night in America.

8.title: The Mueller-sode
8.plot: More and more poker...oh and a closer look at one of the splashiest players we've seen at our table, Mr. Greg Mueller.

9.title: Dalla and 2 Cents
9.plot: Episode 9 features the debut of "Dalla & 2 Cents" as well more hands from Turning Stone Resort and Casino.

10.title: Danielle
10.plot: Poker Night in America travels to Maryland Live! for an exciting cash game with an all new cast. We also take a moment to learn a little bit about Danielle Andersen or Dmoongirl.

11.title: Gavin Rides Alone
11.plot: Bacon Jackets, Bar Fights and Bold Bets are bountiful in this episode from Maryland Live! in Hanover, MD.

12.title: Bacon Jacket
12.plot: More high jinks involving a jacket made to look like bacon along with at least a little bit of poker here and there. Continuing our stay at Maryland Live! in Hanover, MD.

13.title: Glantz & ODB
13.plot: Matt Glantz & David "ODB" Baker are showcased and the table gets a visit from an Olympian.

14.title: Hi Gene!
14.plot: More action from Maryland Live! and Nolan Dalla dishes the dirt on dirty players at the poker table.

15.title: Maryland Live! Recap
15.plot: We return to Maryland Live! for more poker action. We look back at some of the fun times we had at Maryland Live!

16.title: Peppermill Reno Intro
16.plot: A new casino and a new cast of characters. We're at Peppermill Reno this week for our invite-only cash game. Also, Scotty Nguyen shows us the magic!

17.title: Peppermill Kingpin
17.plot: A new casino and a new cast of characters. We're at Peppermill Reno this week for our invite-only cash game.

18.title: Farewell Chad Brown
18.plot: Poker Night is proud to feature poker pro Chad Brown in one of his last televised appearances.

19.title: The Darkhorse
19.plot: In between hands, we take a trip with the Brunsons to see what they do away from the felt.

20.title: Dalla on Dan Colman
20.plot: We're back at the Peppermill Casino in Reno, NV this week and we've got another rant from Nolan. He's got some choice words about Dan Colman's opinion of poker.

21.title: The Tracker
21.plot: The Reno Peppermill Resort deals out more poker action, plus we take a look at a well-known poker insider.

22.title: Panda Mask
22.plot: The final episode of the 2014 Reno Peppermill series, featuring poker, parties, and panda masks.

23.title: Hanging with Darv
23.plot: The first episode of the 2014 Rivers Casino in Pittsburgh series, plus Darvin Moon shows our crew a good time.

24.title: Darvin v. Cada: The Sequel
24.plot: More poker from Reno, Darvin Moon and Joe Cada square off at the table for the first time since their 2009 WSOP run.

25.title: High Sticking
25.plot: More poker action from The Rivers in Pittsburgh, plus we go center ice at the Console Energy Center.

26.title: Doyle Brunson Interview Part 1
26.plot: More poker action from The Rivers in Pittsburgh, plus part one of Doyle Brunson's exclusive in-depth interview from his Montana property.

27.title: Doyle Brunson Interview Part 2
27.plot: We revisit Turning Stone in Verona, NY, plus part two of Doyle Brunson's exclusive in-depth interview from his Montana property.

28.title: Doyle Brunson Interview Part 3
28.plot: We revisit Turning Stone in Verona, NY, plus part three of Doyle Brunson's exclusive in-depth interview from his Montana property.

29.title: Doyle Brunson Interview Part 4
29.plot: We revisit Turning Stone in Verona, NY, plus part four of Doyle Brunson's exclusive in-depth interview from his Montana property.

1.title: Ladies Night Part 1
1.plot: Season two of Poker Night in America kicks off at the Seminole Hard Rock Hotel & Casino in Hollywood Florida. This is the first part of our historic ladies-only cash game.

2.title: Ladies Night Part 2
2.plot: Our exclusive ladies-only cash game continues at the Seminole Hard Rock in Hollywood, Florida.

3.title: Ladies Night Part 3
3.plot: Our exclusive ladies-only cash game continues at the Seminole Hard Rock in Hollywood, Florida.

4.title: Ladies Night Part 4
4.plot: Our exclusive ladies-only cash game concludes at the Seminole Hard Rock in Hollywood, Florida.

5.title: A People Game Played with Cards
5.plot: Serious mind games are played throughout the Seminole Hard Rock.

6.title: Soda, Bottle Water
6.plot: Continuing the cash game at the Seminole Hard Rock and a look at the SHR Rock 'N' Roll Poker Open.

7.title: A Bunch of Tough Guys
7.plot: On a table full of tough guys, who can keep their cool? Day 2 from our cash game at Seminole Hard Rock in Hollywood, Florida.

8.title: The Chainsaw Stops By
8.plot: Day 2 continues at our exclusive cash game being held at Seminole Hard Rock in Hollywood, Florida, and Alan Kessler visits our set.

9.title: Poker Night Royale
9.plot: Day 1 of our visit to Turning Stone Resort Casino, as well as our very first Poker Night At The Movies segment.

10.title: Cincinnati Kid, by Way of Pittsburgh
10.plot: Cash game action from Turning Stone Resort Casino, plus we take a look at poker portrayed in cinema.

11.title: Todd's 9 and Ocean's 11
11.plot: 9 players belly up to our felt and we explore poker as portrayed in the 2001 remake of "Ocean's 11".

12.title: Straights and Stripes
12.plot: More poker from Turning Stone Resort Casino in Verona, NY. Also, we take a look at the poker in the movie "Stripes".

13.title: Rounding the Turn
13.plot: Turning Stone Resort Casino hosts our exclusive cash game, plus we take a look at the movie "Rounders".

14.title: Cool Hand
14.plot: Our cash game continues in the VIP room at Turning Stone Resort Casino. Our panel of poker and movie experts examines the movie "Cool Hand Luke".

15.title: The Maverick
15.plot: We continue our cash game series in the VIP room at the ultra-posh Turning Stone Resort Casino in Verona, New York.

16.title: The Birth of the Tweedle
16.plot: Our players start inventing new words at our exclusive cash game being held in the VIP room at Turning Stone Resort Casino in Verona, New York.

17.title: Heavy Metal Thunder
17.plot: We end our final episode of the Turning Stone Resort Casino series with loose poker and a headbanger of a party.

18.title: Night of the Drawing Dead
18.plot: Rivers Casino in Pittsburgh, PA hosts our invite-only cash game, and we find out why Pittsburgh is the "Zombie Capitol of the World".

19.title: A Farewell to Joe
19.plot: Our cash game continues at Rivers Casino in Pittsburgh. We also take a moment to remember our good friend, Joe.

20.title: The Defense Checks, Your Honor
20.plot: Some notable names, including Phil Hellmuth and Jennifer Tilly, sidle up to our table for this exclusive cash game held at Rivers Casino in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.

21.title: Smashley
21.plot: The game rolls into the evening at Rivers Casino in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.

22.title: The Bet That Never Was
22.plot: Things get kind of tense at our table in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. Rivers Casino hosts our invite only cash game.

23.title: The Cucumber
23.plot: This episode shows why you should never step away from the table. Our cash game carries on at Rivers Casino in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.

1.title: Dumpster Joe
1.plot: We begin our series at Maryland Live! in Hanover, MD with some recognizable faces squaring off against local pros.

2.title: The Consultologist
2.plot: We head back to the Ram's Head Center Stage at Maryland Live! for our invite-only cash game.

3.title: Home Game
3.plot: A new moment in poker history, and maybe a new low. Our game continues at Maryland Live!

4.title: Who Will Survive at Maryland Live!?
4.plot: Chips change hands all over the table during our cash game at Maryland Live!

5.title: Monied Men with Experience
5.plot: Who gets the money and who gets the experience in this episode from Maryland Live!?

6.title: Two Rules for Success
6.plot: There are two rules for success at poker. We find out what they are in this episode filmed at Maryland Live!.

7.title: Down by the Boardwalk
7.plot: We begin our Atlantic City series at the Golden Nugget with James Woods, Richard Roeper, and Linda Kenny Baden.

8.title: Monopoly Money
8.plot: Our players try to bankrupt each other. See who passes go at our exclusive cash game in our Atlantic City series at Golden Nugget.

9.title: Maverick 2
9.plot: More poker from Atlantic City, plus we review famous scenes from poker movies with James Woods, Richard Roeper, and Ebony Kenney

10.title: Atlantic City by Way of Cincinnati
10.plot: Great poker from the Golden Nugget in Las Vegas, plus we review the poker from Cincinnati Kid.

11.title: What Goes Around Comes Around... Ers
11.plot: The Golden Nugget hosts our invite-only cash game in Atlantic City, plus we review poker from the movie Rounders.

12.title: A Game to Kill For
12.plot: The final night of our Atlantic City series at Golden Nugget. Who is going home rich, and who is going home broke?

13.title: Ladies Night is Alright
13.plot: SugarHouse in Philadelphia hosts Ladies Night.

14.title: Ladies Night is Alright, Pt. 2
14.plot: Phil Hellmuth stops by Ladies Night and enters the fray. Hosted at SugarHouse in Philadelphia.

15.title: Ladies Night is Alright, Pt. 3
15.plot: Ladies Night continues at SugarHouse in Philadelphia, plus the Poker Night staff challenges Jennifer Shahade to a chess match.

16.title: High Steaks Poker
16.plot: We invited the three cheesesteak kings of Philadelphia to our table at SugarHouse. Also, we step away to see where the cheesesteak was invented.

17.title: Cheesesteak Battle
17.plot: Our poker rolls on at SugarHouse in Philadelphia. Also, we take a moment to visit the place where the Philly cheesesteak was perfected.

18.title: Eat Dessert First
18.plot: We continue our invite-only cash game at Sugarhouse in Philadelphia, and we stop by the restaurant that made the Philly Cheesesteak world-famous.

19.title: America's True Pastime
19.plot: We continue at SugarHouse in Philadelphia with America's True Pastime...Texas Hold'em!

20.title: Dalla in 'Delphia
20.plot: The night carries on at SugarHouse in Philadelphia, plus Nolan Dalla gives us his Two Cents.

21.title: Sugar on Top
21.plot: Our cash game reaches its conclusion at SugarHouse in Philadelphia. Who will scoop the final pots?

1.title: Twitch Celebrity Cash Game, Part 1 - It Begins
1.plot: We collect the best poker streamers from Twitch.tv, as well as a few notable Vegas pros, to host our first ever Twitch Celebrity Cash Game. From a secret location in Las Vegas, NV we find out if the streamers can hang with the live players...or vise versa...featuring Dan O'Brian, Phil Laak, Randy Lew, Jason Somerville, Antonio Esfandiari, Jamie Staples, Scott Ball, and Bertrand Grosspellier.

2.title: Twitch Celebrity Cash Game, Part 2 - Rampage
2.plot: Our exclusive Twitch Celebrity Cash Game is in full swing, and the only thing more outrageous than the personalities is the pot sizes. From a private residence living room in Las Vegas, NV, this is cash game poker at its most entertaining. Featuring Dan O'Brian, Phil Laak, Randy Lew, Jason Somerville, Antonio Esfandiari, Jamie Staples, Scott Ball, and Bertrand Grosspellier.

3.title: Twitch Celebrity Cash Game, Part 3 - The Kissing Bet
3.plot: The Twitch Celebrity Cash Game in Las Vegas barrels on into the night as our curated collection of Twitch streamers and Vegas pros swap chips and insults. Featuring Dan O'Brian, Phil Laak, Randy Lew, Jason Somerville, Antonio Esfandiari, Maria Ho, Jamie Staples, Scott Ball, and Bertrand Grosspellier.

4.title: Twitch Celebrity Cash Game, Part 4 - Damn, Daniel!
4.plot: As word gets around Las Vegas that our cash game is in full swing, some notable players stop by and try and get in. Featuring Daniel Negreanu, Dan O'Brian, Phil Laak, Randy Lew, Jason Somerville, Antonio Esfandiari, Maria Ho, Jamie Staples, Scott Ball, and Bertrand Grosspellier.

5.title: Twitch Celebrity Cash Game, Part 5 - Psychic Flow
5.plot: The poker from Las Vegas continues apace, and Phil Laak channels the psychic energy of the universal overmind to hone his poker play. Featuring Daniel Negreanu, Dan O'Brian, Phil Laak, Randy Lew, Jason Somerville, Antonio Esfandiari, Maria Ho, Jaime Staples, Scott Ball, and Bertrand Grosspellier.

6.title: Twitch Celebrity Cash Game, Part 6 - Aces That Fly
6.plot: After losing the biggest pot in Poker Night history, Antonio Esfandiari is slowing regaining ground. Can he continue to build his stack against the best online and live players in Vegas? Featuring Daniel Negreanu, Dan O'Brian, Phil Laak, Randy Lew, Jason Somerville, Antonio Esfandiari, Maria Ho, Jaime Staples, Scott Ball, and Bertrand Grosspellier

7.title: Needle in Chip Stack
7.plot: Settle in for a "friendly" game of poker in upstate New York with us as we visit Turning Stone Resort Casino. Featuring Mike Sigel, Dew Micali, Matt Glantz, Steve Ruddock, Jared Bleznick, Samantha Abernathy, Shaun Deeb, Joe McKeehen, and Mike Dentale.

8.title: Upstate Action
8.plot: All it takes is a few All-Ins to put these pros on tilt. Find out who ends up getting felted, from our exclusive cash game at Turning Stone Resort Casino in Upstate New York. Featuring Mike Sigel, Dew Micali, Matt Glantz, Rep Porter, Jared Bleznick, Samantha Abernathy, Shaun Deeb, Joe McKeehen, and Mike Dentale.

9.title: Awkward Silence...
9.plot: Nothing brings the mood at the table down faster than a sore loser after a bad beat...which is EXACTLY what happens in this episode. The tension is thick at Turning Stone Resort Casino. Featuring Mike Sigel, Bart Hanson, Matt Glantz, Rep Porter, Jared Bleznick, Samantha Abernathy, Shaun Deeb, Joe McKeehen, and Mike Dentale.

10.title: Pillow Talk
10.plot: Joe McKeehen and Tom Canulli square off at our table months ahead of their 2015 WSOP final table show down. Featuring Richard Anthony, Dominick Christiano, Alec Torelli, Thomas Cannuli, Matt Glantz, Travell Thomas, Joe McKeehen, Shaun Deeb, and Bart Hanson.

11.title: Turn and Burn
11.plot: There are some hurt feelings after some big hands in this invite-only cash game from Turning Stone Resort Casino in Verona, NY. Featuring Richard Anthony, Rep Porter, Alec Torelli, Thomas Cannuli, Mike Dentale, Travell Thomas, Joe McKeehen, Shaun Deeb, and Bart Hanson.

12.title: Coach Fight
12.plot: Two prominent poker coaches square off on our table from Turning Stone Resort Casino in Verona, NY. Featuring Richard Anthony, Rep Porter, Alec Torelli, Thomas Cannuli, Mike Dentale, Travell Thomas, Joe McKeehen, Shaun Deeb, and Bart Hanson.

13.title: Shots, Shots, Shots
13.plot: There is an alligator in the parking lot, and Hellmuth's luck runs out at Seminole Hard Rock Casino Resort in Hollywood, Florida. Featuring Jared Jaffee, Sorel Mizzi, Matt Glantz, Alec Torelli, Matt Affleck, Michael Sigel, Ben Tarzia, Jennifer Tilly, Samantha Abernathy, Dan O'Brien, and Phil Hellmuth.

14.title: Hard Knocks at Hard Rock
14.plot: Jennifer Tilly tries to dig herself out of a hole. Featuring Jared Jaffee, Sorel Mizzi, Matt Glantz, Alec Torelli, Matt Affleck, Michael Sigel, Ben Tarzia, Jennifer Tilly, Samanta Abernathy, Dan O'Brien, and Phil Hellmuth.

15.title: Upstuck
15.plot: Laak and Hellmuth square off, and Jess Dawley shows us the breakfast of champions. Featuring Alec Torelli, Phil Laak, Asher Conniff, Josh Beckley, Abbey Daniels, Joe McKeehen, Phil Hellmuth, Jessica Dawley, Michael Laake, Esther Taylor, and Blake Bohn.

16.title: Phil vs Phil
16.plot: Laak has good news and bad news for Hellmuth as our cash game winds down at Seminole Hard Rock Casino Resort in Hollywood, Florida. Featuring Alec Torelli, Phil Laak, Asher Conniff, Josh Beckley, Abbey Daniels, Joe McKeehen, Phil Hellmuth, Jessica Dawley, Michael Laake, Esther Taylor-Brady, and Blake Bohn.

17.title: The Robot
17.plot: We bring our invite-only cash game to Rivers Casino in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, and a new player calculates the odds. Featuring Matt Glantz, Sam Ganzfried, Dave Eldridge, David Baker, Igor Ioffe, Jennifer Harman, Phil Laak, Dan Wolf, and Jennifer Tilly.

18.title: Claudico: Part 1
18.plot: We continue our cash game from the Rivers Casino, and we begin the first part of our series featuring the poker playing artificial intelligence named "Claudico". Featuring Matt Glantz, Sam Ganzfried, Dave Eldridge, David Baker, Igor Ioffe, Jennifer Harman, Phil Laak, Dan Wolf, and Jennifer Tilly.

19.title: Claudico: Part 2
19.plot: Our cash game meanders on at the Rivers Casino, and we show Part 2 of our series featuring the poker-playing artificial intelligence named "Claudico". Featuring Tom Schneider, Dan Wolf, Mike Vierheller, David Baker, Jack Schanbacher, Phil Laak, Igor "Eric" Ioffe, and Mark "Pegasus" Smith.

20.title: Claudico: Part 3
20.plot: Tom Schneider carpet bombs donkeys, and we conclude our artificial intelligence feature highlighting "Claudico", an advanced poker playing AI. Featuring Tom Schneider, Dan Wolf, Mike Vierheller, David Baker, Jack Schanbacher, Phil Laak, Igor "Eric" Ioffe, and Mark "Pegasus" Smith.

21.title: Carrol Top
21.plot: We bring our cash game for the first time to Choctaw Resort Casino in Durant, Oklahoma. Pros and locals square off, and Jim Carrol has a bag of tricks. Featuring Cate Hall, Brandon Cantu, Todd Brunson, Dennis Phillips, BJ Imejjane, Kage Gardner, George Ritacco, Phil Hellmuth, and Jim Carroll.

22.title: Blind Hands and Props
22.plot: Our game continues from Choctaw Casino Resort in Durant, Oklahoma, and props fly across the table. Featuring Cate Hall, Brandon Cantu, Todd Brunson, Dennis Phillips, BJ Imejjane, Kage Gardner, George Ritacco, Phil Hellmuth, and Jim Carroll.

23.title: Toddler Fight Club
23.plot: We bring in a new cast of characters to give their best at Choctaw Casino Resort. Featuring Etay Brady, Daphne Turner, Matt Russell, Brandon Cantu, Roger Sippl, Phil Hellmuth, Craig Stanley, Gavin Smith, Greg Himmelbrand, and Alec Torelli.

24.title: Rich Friends
24.plot: We find out why bluffs are like potato chips at Choctaw Resort Casino. Featuring Etay Brady, Daphne Turner, Matt Russell, Brandon Cantu, Roger Sippl, Phil Hellmuth, Craig Stanley, Gavin Smith, Greg Himmelbrand, and Alec Torelli.

25.title: Face Up with Phil Hellmuth: Part 1
25.plot: Texahoma Hold'em at its best from Choctaw Casino Resort. Also, we go deep with Phil Hellmuth in our first ever interview segment called Face Up. Featuring Nelda Escamilla, Alec Torelli, Phil Hellmuth, Todd Brunson, Dany George, Brandon Cantu, Roger Sippl, Gavin Smith, Jason Ettredge, and Cate Hall.

26.title: Face Up with Phil Hellmuth: Part 2
26.plot: Texahoma locals show our pros a few tricks. Also, we conclude our first ever Face Up interview with Phil Hellmuth. Featuring Nelda Escamilla, Alec Torelli, Phil Hellmuth, Todd Brunson, Dany George, Brandon Cantu, Roger Sippl, Gavin Smith, Jason Ettredge, and Cate Hall.

27.title: Our 100th Episode!
27.plot: We head back to Seminole Hard Rock Casino in Hollywood, Florida with a few of our favorite poker players. Some of them wake up with good hands, but others are stuck in a chip nightmare. Featuring Ian O'Hara, Stewart Newman, Phil Laak, Mukul Pahuja, Phil Hellmuth, Alec Torelli, David Silverman, Jeff Gross, and Matt Seidman.

28.title: Shades vs Goggles
28.plot: Seminole Hard Rock Casino in Hollywood, FL hosts our cash game while the players test out different eye wear at the table. Featuring Ian O'Hara, Stewart Newman, Phil Laak, Noah Schwartz, Phil Hellmuth, Alec Torelli, David Silverman, Jeff Gross, and Matt Seidman.

29.title: Kentucky Fried Poker
29.plot: We head to Rivers Casino in Pittsburgh, PA where our very own Chris Hanson becomes an honorary Kentucky Colonel. Also, our crew tells the harrowing tale of #GroundPizza. Featuring Matt Glantz, Chris Horter, Mark Smith, Phil Laak, Dave Eldridge, Jennifer Harman, and Tom Schneider.

30.title: Attack of the Yinzers
30.plot: The locals in Pittsburgh show the pros how its done from Rivers Casino in Pittsburgh, PA. Featuring Jennifer Tilly, Chris Horter, Nick Immekus, David Baker, Dan Wolf, Jennifer Harman, Jason Andrews, Dave Eldridge, Matt Glantz, Phil Laak, Tom Schneider, and Mark Smith.

31.title: Down in the Valley
31.plot: Poker Night in America makes its first visit to Thunder Valley Casino Resort just outside of Sacramento, CA. Featuring Mark Kroon, Maria Ho, Scott Ball, Phil Hellmuth, Alan Richardson, Lorrie Corvin, and Mike Ross.

32.title: A Toast to Good Fortune
32.plot: We continue our cash game from Thunder Valley Casino Resort, and as individual chip fortunes rise and fall some players realize their good fortune overall. Featuring Rep Porter, Maria Ho, Scott Ball, Phil Hellmuth, Alan Richardson, Bart Hanson, and Mike Ross.

33.title: Billionaire Besties
33.plot: Some of Phil Hellmuth's best friends from Silicon Valley join our table at Thunder Valley Casino Resort. Featuring Anthony Pagan, Jason Calacanis, David Baker, Phil Hellmuth, Tom West, Chamath Palihapitiya, and Taylor Paur.

34.title: Money Buys Happiness
34.plot: The poker action is non-stop, and so are the name drops from Thunder Valley Casino Resort. Featuring Matt Glantz, Jason Calacanis, David Baker, Phil Hellmuth, Bob Mather, Chamath Palihapitiya, Bart Hanson, and Maria Ho.

35.title: California Cooler
35.plot: The stakes heat up as the night winds down at Thunder Valley Casino Resort. Featuring JC Tran, Mike Ross, Mark Bonsack, Phil Hellmuth, Keith Bowman, Bart Hanson, and David Baker.

36.title: Favorite Poker Ho
36.plot: We conclude the poker from our first visit to NorCal and Thunder Valley Casino Resort. Featuring Mike Ross, Mark Kroon, JC Tran, Doug Lorgeree, Bart Hanson, David Baker, and Maria Ho.

37.title: Sleeveless in Paradise
37.plot: We film cash game poker in the Paradise Live stage at the Seminole Hard Rock Resort in Hollywood, Florida. Featuring Paul Harris, Jake Schindler, Samantha Abernathy, Mike Dentale, Mike Sigel, and Joe DiPascale.

38.title: Mike Check
38.plot: Jennifer Tilly meets a bunch of Mikes at our cash game table from the Paradise Live stage at Seminole Hard Rock Casino Resort in Hollywood, Florida. Featuring Greg Marcus, Alex Rocha, Michael Laake, Jennifer Tilly, Mike Dentale, Mike Sigel, and Joe DiPascale.

39.title: The One That Got Away
39.plot: From Seminole Hard Rock Casino Resort in Hollywood, Florida, Vanessa Rousso makes her first appearance on Poker Night along with some regulars to the show. Featuring Phil Laak, Vanessa Rousso, Matt Affleck, Jared Jaffee, Noah Schwartz, Alan Richardson, and Glynn Beebe.

40.title: Straight Shooter
40.plot: Phil Laak puts his chips in with "delicate, consistent, well-appointed strength" from Seminole Hard Rock Casino Resort in Hollywood, Florida. Featuring Mukul Pahuja, Matt Salsberg, Matt Affleck, Phil Laak, Dan Shak, Esther Taylor, and Asher Conniff.

41.title: Ladies Night III
41.plot: Back by popular demand, we invited just the ladies to Seminole Hard Rock in Hollywood, Florida, for a night of poker with considerably less body hair around the table. Featuring Vanessa Rousso, Esther Taylor, Samantha Abernathy, Danielle Anderson, Abbey Daniels, Natasha Mercier, and Stacey Sullivan.

42.title: Ace Race
42.plot: Ladies Night III continues from Seminole Hard Rock in Hollywood, Florida. Featuring Vanessa Rousso, Esther Taylor, Samantha Abernathy, Danielle Andersen, Abbey Daniels, Natasha Mercier, and Stacey Sullivan.

locations: Turning Stone Resort Casino, Verona, New York, USA::(on location)
imdb.title: Poker Night in America
